title: Sufood - Banqiao
description: 舒果新米蘭蔬食, at 新北市板橋區遠東路1號 in Banqiao, is a high-end vegetarian cuisine chain with locations in Taiwan. Modern, upscale decor. Features a set menu. You choose from one of few main entrees, plus you get appetizer, bread, soup, salad, dessert, and drink. You can only order it as part of a set menu. Some dishes use eggs and dairy; server will point out which dishes are suitable for you.
